attributes.action: Make medical cannabis more readily available for patients sufferings from MS
attributes.background: We want the government to ensure that people suffering from illness such as MS are able to get medical cannabis as it is not often prescribed.

rejection.details:
Prescriptions are clinical decisions rather than a decision for the UK Government or Parliament.   If you'd like it to be available without prescription, you might like to sign these petitions

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596416
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598861
